cardPackage.description: With the Student Account you get unlimited card swipes, the ability to manage your money 24/7 and a range of value-added services. After four years, you will be upgraded to a Gold Graduate account.

bulletPoints: Unlimited Absa Online, mobile and telephone banking
Unlimited electronic payments including debit and stop orders
Unlimited local card swipes and cash withdrawals
Unlimited Absa ATM balance enquires and mini-statements
Unlimited Absa ATM cash deposits (excluding cardless cash deposits) and withdrawals
Unlimited CashSend withdrawals at Absa ATMs
24/7 access to the largest ATM network in South Africa
Food voucher to be redeemed at selected fast food outlets
Up to 30% discount on a membership at selected gyms
Complete atleast 5 debit or credit banking transactions per month of which at least two must be prepaid transactions
packages.package: How to qualify for your monthly benefits:

bulletPoints: Or dial *120*3475# and follow the prompts
